topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53acf5966368726a75e50000#post_53acf5966368726a75e50000
The show hit the sweet spot when it comes to not taking itself too seriously, it was just silly enough to roll with the premise while internally consistent enough to avoid it seeming like no one cared about the end product.
